markdown.markdown:
:::{#intro-heading} I am an undergraduate student at [Macalester College](https://www.macalester.edu/) studying Statistics, Psychology, and Computer Science. I am currently working on my Honors Thesis, "Topological Data Analysis of Knowledge Networks," to study how science evolves under the supervision of [Prof. Lori Ziegelmeier](https://www.loriziegelmeier.com/). ::: ### Research Interest I aspire to develop novel statistical methods with machine learning and create new statistical, computational, and bioinformatics techniques to study complex diseases and neuropsychiatric disorders using high-dimensional data. Through the integration of high-throughput data and clinical information, I aim to uncover the genetic factors and biomarkers influencing patient survival and unravel the complex pathologies of these under-studied conditions. My research goal is to provide valuable insights into disease mechanisms and therapeutic strategies, offering hope to patients facing limited treatment options. ### Education Macalester College | St. Paul, MN
B.A. in Statistics, Minors in Psychology and Computer Science | GPA: 4.0 | Sept 2020 - May 2024 ### Programming Skills **Languages:** R, Java, Python, SQL, MATLAB **Utilities:** Rstudio, Anaconda, Git, Jupiter Notebook, Tableau ### Selected Coursework **Mathematics/Statistics:** Mathematical Statistics, Statistical Genetics, Survival Analysis, Probability, Real Analysis (in progress), Topology, Computational Linear Algebra, Statistical Machine Learning, Introduction to Statistical Modeling **Computer Science:** Computational Geometry (in progress), Algorithm Design & Analysis, Data Structures, Object-Oriented Programming and Abstraction **Neuroscience/Psychology:** Behavioral Neuroscience, Introduction to Neuroscience, Neuroscience of Reward (planned), Educational Psychology, Introduction to Psychology ### Research Experiences - **Children's Cancer Research Fund (CCRF) Researcher**, *07/2023 - Present* - *Supervised by [Prof. Sunny Chan](https://med.umn.edu/bio/sunny-chan)* - *Chan Lab, Department of Pediatrics, University of Minnesota* - **NSF-funded Undergraduate Researcher**, *05/2023 - Present* - *Supervised by [Prof. Russell Funk](https://carlsonschool.umn.edu/faculty/russell-funk), [Prof. Lori Ziegelmeier](https://www.loriziegelmeier.com/), and [Prof. Jason Owen-Smith](https://fordschool.umich.edu/faculty/jason-owen-smith)*. - **Research Programmer**, *07/2022 - 01/2023* - *Supervised by Jaejin Lee, Principle Data Scientist, and Lingling Yang, Postdoc Associate* - [*Neuromodulation Research Center*](https://nmrc.umn.edu/), *Department of Neuroloogy, University of Minnesota* ### Selected Talks and Poster Sessions - **AIM-AMS Special Session on Applied Topology, Joint Mathematics Meeting**, *01/2024* - **Applied Algebraic Topology Research Networ (AATRN) Poster Session**, *11/2023* - **MAA-NCS Fall Meeting**, *09/2023* - *Topological Data Analysis of Knowledge Networks* ### In-class Projects - **Hidden Markov Model Application in Multiple Testing to Address Linkage Disequilibrium in Genome-Wide Association Study**, *09/2022 - 12/2022* - *Supervised by [Prof. Kelsey Grinde](https://kegrinde.github.io/)* - **A Survival Analysis of Sexual Debut Among Adolescents**, *09/2022 - 12/2022* - *Supervised by [Prof. Vittorio Addona](https://sites.google.com/macalester.edu/vittorioaddonahomepage/home)* ### Teaching Experience - **MATH/STAT 455: Mathematical Statistics**, *Macalester College, 01/2024 - 05/2024 (Planned)* - Instructor: [Prof. Taylor Okonek](https://taylorokonek.github.io/) - **MATH/STAT 354: Probability**, *Macalester College, 09/2022 - 12/2022* - Instructor: [Prof. Alicia Johnson](https://ajohns24.github.io/portfolio/) - **COMP 127: Object-Oriented Programming & Abstraction**, *Macalester College, 09/2021 - 5/2022* - Instructor: [Prof. Joslenne Peña](https://jpena831.github.io/) ### Extracurricular Activities - **Co-Chair, Student Advisory Board**, *09/2023 - Present* - **Member, Student Advisory Board**, *09/2022 - Present* - *Department of Mathematics, Statistics, and Computer Science, Macalester College* - **Database Volunteer**, *01/2022 - 05/2022* - [*International Institute of Minnesota*](https://iimn.org/) - **Data Analysis Volunteer**, *02/2022 - 08/2022* - [*Foundations for Essential Needs*](https://ffen.org/) ### Contact **Email**: jguan@macalester.edu \ **Phone**: +1 651-363-5786
